message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $220, but I'm open to hearing your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth significantly more than that to me. Could you meet me halfway at $170?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140.
